name: Jumpy Jakster
description:
Play the dino run but not dino. this time. Let's see how far we can go.
My record is 11589.

.

After furiously hunting for NullReferenceException bugs, which in fact is different from person to person. Even google won't help us easily. The next bug is the audio crackling sound. Bug is in every game development, let's embrace it.

Finally after a long cold battle, this game is done. Phew!

Have fun!
